Judul: ASTRO TALK  IN SOCIAL MEDIA - INDONESIA
Abstrak: Social media is a new trend in communicating and connecting to people. It is also a good choise to buid awareness of astronomy as issues spread easily and quickly, creating hot topic. This paper will analyze the trend of astro talk in Indonesia and hope to inspire astronomers to use social media in raising awareness
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
